name: deployefcoremigrations
description: Deploy Entity Framework Core Migrations from a DLL.
author: bendayconsulting

inputs.name: migrationsDll
inputs.label: Migrations DLL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to the DLL that contains the EF migrations to deploy.

inputs.name: migrationsNamespace
inputs.label: Migrations Namespace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root namespace for the EF migrations.

inputs.name: startupDll
inputs.label: Startup DLL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to the DLL to start deploying migrations from. If you're publishing migrations from a web project, choose the web project DLL.  Otherwise, choose the migration DLL.

inputs.name: dbContextClassName
inputs.label: Class name of the DbContext
inputs.helpMarkDown: Class name of the dbcontext for the migrations without namespace.

inputs.name: deployMigrationByName
inputs.label: Deploy a specific migration by name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, this deploys a named migration.  If false, this deploys all migrations.

inputs.name: migrationName
inputs.label: Migration name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the migration to deploy.
